Name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia
About the game: Join the Little Mouse in her journey to explore the fascinating world of nature! Together you will learn about countless species of animals and plants in their natural habitats while feasting your eyes on a set of charmingly painted forests, waters and gardens. - discover over 160 species of animals and plants in 4 different habitats - a fun way to learn - easy and intuitive controls - available in many languages
